archimate:ApplicationComponent.name: Post Office Data Gateway [PODG]
archimate:ApplicationComponent.documentation:
Provides scheduled and regular data transfer and transformation between internal system and external services / agencies.
Camel is used for route creation and file manipulation and runs on the internal server only JScape is used for external connectivity and runs on the external server only Rsync is used to synchronise the filesystem between the internal and external servers
Runs on Java 6 JVM
Post Office Data Gateway (PODG) Technical Documents
